intro: Angiopteris shanyuanensis, commonly known as the Shanyuan shield fern, is a species of fern native to China. It belongs to the family Athyriaceae and is characterized by its large, shield-shaped fronds. The plant exhibits a distinctive morphology with a short, creeping rhizome and large, pinnately compound leaves. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in forest undergrowth. Its botanical features make it a subject of interest for both horticultural and taxonomic studies.
